serverDown() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.am42.network.tcp.client.ClientTCP
This method manages the server's disconnection It updates the view It sets the flag to stop running the Thread It closes all the streams and connections If something goes wrong during these closing process it waits before closing the program
